text:
@CNN Yo, @senategop & @housegop:

The King of Trumplandia held rallies on:
Jan 9, 14, 28, 30
Feb 10, 19, 20, 21, 28
He golfed on:
Jan 18, 19
Feb 1, 15
Mar 7, 8

But sure, impeachment (ended Feb 5th) is what stopped him from responding to the #coronavirus.
